name: Masken
description: Masken means "the worm" in Swedish, and this is another "snake" game. You must guide your worm around a playfield filled with spades, hearts and clubs, giving respectively 5, 10 and 15 points as well as growing your worm. Avoid the squares, which cost you 20 points. A special bonus item gives another five free points. As usual, the objective is to grow as long as possible, scoring as many points as possible. The number of items on the playfield grows along with your worm. Controls are via the Swedish "snake" standard of M and Z for turning clockwise and counter-clockwise.

shot.caption: It's not very well programmed – I grew so much I caused a score overflow
